verbs.description: [V: Speaking] [ARGM-LOC: at a White House event honoring NASCAR Cup Series champion Martin Truex Jr.] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] claimed he ignored advice to not make his " controversial " comments on the protests , for which he has criticized NFL players .
